description.en:
Hari’s normal. Sure, she can’t remember anything from when she was a child, but apart from that, she’s just a relatively unknown actress who dreams of making it big. All is well. That is, until she gets kidnapped. Luckily, Hari manages to emerge from that incident relatively unscathed, but… Why is the man who saved her following her around? What does a missing person’s case from twenty years ago have to do with anything? What secrets will be unearthed from Hari’s missing memories?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/649981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/guardians-of-the-lamb/list?title_no=3713)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/64097)
description.id:
Yang Hari adalah seorang wanita ceria yang menjalani hidupnya sebagai aktris tanpa nama. Hingga suatu hari hidupnya didatangi kejadian tak terduga! Yang Hari diculik dan diselamatkan oleh orang yang mengaku telah ditugaskan menjaganya. Perlahan-lahan, ingatan masa lalu yang telah Yang Hari kubur dalam-dalam semakin terbuka. Ke manakah ingatan ini akan membawa Yang Hari?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/649981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/guardians-of-the-lamb/list?title_no=3713)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/64097)
description.ja:
陽気な性格の「日辻葉有」。普通の無名俳優な彼女には、8才以前の記憶がない。 突然の拉致事件に巻き込まれた葉有は誘拐犯よりも危険そうな男「井手武道」によって救出される。 葉有を狙う正体不明の勢力、連続殺人を起こす危険なカルト教団、それらに負けないくらい残酷な井手、 そして葉有を守るように彼を雇った謎の人物…。 守る者と追う者、記憶を失った者のトライアングル・サスペンス。 葉有の隠された過去は彼女をどこへ導くのだろうか。

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/649981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/guardians-of-the-lamb/list?title_no=3713)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/64097)
description.ko:
대한민국 금선시에서 평범한 무명배우로 살아오던 여자, 양하리.
어느 날 갑자기 정체불명의 세력에 의해 신변을 위협당하게 된다.
그런 그녀를 지켜준다 말하며 나타난 남자,
지키려는 자와 쫓는 자, 그리고 기억을 잃은 자.
양하리의 잃어버린 과거는 그녀를 어떤 길로 이끌 것인가?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/649981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/guardians-of-the-lamb/list?title_no=3713)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/64097)
description.zh:
小时候意外失忆的杨夏莉，在一场绑架事件中因李青武获救，后来才得知原来是有人雇用了李青武来保护自己。到底是谁绑架她，而又是谁雇用保镖保护自己的呢？

---
